statements: UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET unit_price = 25.99 WHERE order_id = 2;
UPDATE sales_data SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE order_id = 3;
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE sales_data SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 2 WHERE customer_id = 5001;
UPDATE sales_data SET product_name = 'New Product', unit_price = 25.99 WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET amount = 200.00 WHERE sale_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', phone = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE customer_id = 1 AND sale_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE customers SET phone = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM sales WHERE sale_id = 100);

UPDATE products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 100;

UPDATE products SET price = 25.99 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE sales SET total_amount = total_amount * 0.9 WHERE sale_date <= '2022-01-01';

UPDATE orders SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1 WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE sales_reps SET sales_rep_email = CONCAT('new.', sales_rep_email) WHERE sales_rep_id IN (1, 2);
